attributes.action: Outsource the UK government to China, using the savings made in wages etc. to help the poor
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The UK government has over many years let companies eliminate millions of skilled jobs, with many outsourced to countries such as India or China.  I believe that outsourcing the UK government to China would be a good idea as it would save millions of pounds which could then be used to help the poor. And the Chinese workers employed to do the jobs that MP's are currently doing just as well.

reasons: Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
